name: Child Support
description: Help children in need by volunteering your time or resources to support organizations that provide child care, education, and health services.

name: Refuge Shelter
description: Provide a safe haven for those in need by volunteering at a shelter or donating to organizations that support refugees and asylum seekers.

name: Food Charity
description: Help fight hunger by volunteering at a food bank or donating to organizations that provide meals and support to those in need.

name: Host a Clothing Swap
description: Reduce waste and promote sustainable fashion by hosting a clothing swap event or donating clothes to organizations that support clothing reuse and recycling.
